file_content.text: Our paths have already crossed. Will yours lead to death or renown, I wonder?
You... you are a tenacious one. I see now that you will be a great match for Reneget.
It is likely that either you or our brother will die in the bloodshed to come.
Now, at least, I will not be alone when fate chooses the victor.
When the bloodshed to come is done, I may be truly alone.
Don't die just yet, Kren. I still need your comm codes.
Help me contact Vause.
I am not so far gone as you think. These wounds will fade in time. Let me speak.
What are you talking about?
Snap out of it, Kren. I ain't done with you yet.
You're delirious.
It is you who fails to understand.
We share a kinship now, you and I, two tribes joining in the aftermath of bloodshed, but the Blooding is not yet complete.
All the tribe must spill blood. You must face our brother. In this I fear I will only trade one sibling for another.
My instructions are to take Vause alive.
I won't be killing Vause.
As I feared. There is no worse disgrace for a Trandoshan than capture.
Like you said, at least you won't be alone.
Sorry it's gotta end this way.
Yes, the tribe continues on. I welcome having a new sister among the stars.
Yes, the tribe continues on. I welcome having a new brother among the stars.
Reneget does not share my views. Do not expect him to accept defeat.
Heed this warning, sister: When you challenge Reneget, he will fight to the death.
Heed this warning, brother: When you challenge Reneget, he will fight to the death.
You and me, we ain't gonna be real close.
I'm wiping you out. [Kill him]
Vause is of my tribe, a brother of blood. Should you best him, I will be the last of my tribe. A sad fate.
I ask you. Do not rob me of my last brother.
A tribe of one, or a tribe of none. Your choice.
Give me Vause. Now.
It's the only way this can go.
Then it is already decided.
Reneget will not accept defeat. Know that when you clash, one of you will die.
Take what you've come for and leave me to endure alone.
Let me spare you the heartache.
Want mercy? Here. [Kill Kren]
Captain! Kill this bleeder!
The enemy is on the march! Why are those cannons still offline?
I wondered when you'd come.
If you know who I am, you know why I'm here.
Let's make this quick, Kren.
You intend for me to share fates with Gradak and Ayor-v9.
Sorry if I kept you waiting. Who spoiled the surprise?
You've been expecting me, huh?
My brother told me a would-be bounty hunter came for him. We enjoyed a good laugh at your foolishness.
Don't try anything. Nobody's gonna save you now.
I've got you dead to rights.
I should raise the alert and bring the entire ship down on your head. Even if you killed me, you would find no escape.
Capture and torture would be your fate. It would disappoint Reneget to learn you came so far only to be robbed of a glorious death.
We don't need to involve anyone else.
Keep it between us.
I do hate to disappoint.
That would be a shame.
Good, then we shall meet as warriors.
He gonna feel the same way after I wipe the floor with you?
I'm not the one dying today.
Haha, you are as confident as I have heard.
My people have a ritual of communion we partake in before a Blooding. Will you join me in this?
I can respect that. I'll participate in your ritual.
I will.
It has been some time since I have done this, stranger. It seems an age ago when I took to the stars.
My home is a harsh place; there is no room for weakness. In the lean times, when two tribes meet, we have a Blooding.
The survivors of this ritual form a new tribe. Brothers and sisters in blood... my brothers and sisters are few now.
I think you better tell me what this is.
What is it you're giving me?
A potion to elevate the spirit for the coming mingling of our blood. It shall do you no harm.
Why die for Vause? Just call him here. He can fight his own battles.
You sure you want to do this?
I enjoy my brother's rituals of hunting for sport. You will boost my Jagganath nicely.
It will chafe Reneget to learn that he let such a formidable opponent slip away. I will enjoy lording it over him.
They're about to be one fewer.
It'll be a small funeral then.
This shall be a battle to remember, regardless of victor.
There, we are ready for the Blooding to begin.
If you intend to put up a fight, Kren, let's get on with it.
I'll pass.
Very well, it is your day to die.
Xan, join in this Blooding with me. The rest of you, do not interfere.
May the strong survive.
I'd rather plant one in that bullseye of yours, monoc.
Shut up and die. [Attack.]
Get off my bridge.
Let us see what fate thinks of you, hunter.
This battle is between us alone. Do not interfere.
